definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Lastyear, a Nepalese man bit a cobra after it bit him first.
sentences.chinese: 去年，一名尼泊爾人在被眼鏡蛇咬後反把這條蛇咬死。

sentences.english: Yongzhou elapidaes refer to several poisonous snakes in cobra family with high medical value.
sentences.chinese: 永州異蛇係指眼鏡蛇科的幾種劇毒蛇。

sentences.english: Inhale, slide the hips forwards, and arch the head and chest up into the Cobra pose (see pp. 64-5).
sentences.chinese: 吸氣，臀部往前推，頭向前仰並擴胸，成眼鏡蛇式。

sentences.english: AIM: To study the anti angiogenesis effects of the active fraction separated from Naja Atra venom.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究中華眼鏡蛇毒活性組分的抗血管生成作用。

sentences.english: Boss: So the Cobras could ambush him.
sentences.chinese: 這樣眼鏡蛇才能伏擊他。

sentences.english: Nearby, the Liyuan Meiwei restaurant illegally offers cobra.
sentences.chinese: 附近還有一家叫利源美味的飯店，非法銷售眼鏡蛇。

sentences.english: His reason? The cobras at nearby snake farms were behaving strangely.
sentences.chinese: 他的理由是什麼呢？附近養蛇場的眼鏡蛇舉止異常。

sentences.english: Cobra helicopter circling overhead for most of the day fired rockets at a tree-line nearby.
sentences.chinese: 阿眼鏡蛇直升機上空盤旋多數時間發射火箭樹線附近。

sentences.english: A mongoose in a life-and-death battle with a cobra.
sentences.chinese: 與眼鏡蛇進行生死攸關搏鬥的？

sentences.english: Black-necked cobras whose venomous spit can blind their enemies?
sentences.chinese: 眼鏡蛇的毒液可以使對手失明？

sentences.english: The makers of the nerve poison include the mambas.
sentences.chinese: 產生神經毒液的蛇有一種非洲樹眼鏡蛇和眼鏡蛇。

sentences.english: The makers of the nerve poison include the mambas.
sentences.chinese: 產生神經毒液的蛇有一種非洲樹眼鏡蛇和眼鏡蛇。

sentences.english: A spotted hyena keeps its distance from an aggressive Cape cobra
sentences.chinese: 一隻黑斑鬣犬與一條好鬥的好望角眼鏡蛇保持距離。

sentences.english: Do it! Ruin him. Just as he did the Cobras .
sentences.chinese: 滅了他，就像他對眼鏡蛇做的一樣。

definition: name used for many fishing birds/cormorant/osprey
on call/always available/ready at all times
to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
